file_content.text: Greetings.
A soldier? What a waste. No soldier can match the power of a Sith.
You must not have heard of Havoc Squad.
Get ready to be surprised.
I don't waste my time with trivial nonsense.
If it's my friend you want, I'll just go on about my business.
Have fun, guys!
At last--a real, live Jedi. How I've looked forward to this. A true Sith cannot go long without a true challenge.
I won't fight you if you don't make me.
Don't do this.
Pitiful words, don't waste your final breaths with them.
You create a conflict that need not exist. We can settle this matter peacefully.
There's no need for violence.
I was promised a battle, and I will have it.
Kilran promised me a challenge, and this is what I get?
Overconfidence is a great weakness.
You underestimate us.
Your lust for battle can only lead to destruction.
Don't do this.
Ah! A Jedi! Much better.
Keep him talking--I'll flank him.
I have an idea.
A Sith is not so easily fooled.
I'm more than enough trouble for you, pal.
Don't underestimate me.
You are nothing.
None of you will leave here alive.
Get ready to die.
Death will never come for me. I am death.
To destroy a dangerous foe... that is the way of a true Sith.
When I carve your heart from your chest, your fellow Jedi will sense your defeat. As will my master.
And will your master feel it when I put a blaster shot right between your eyes?
Oh, yeah?
Some people get to have all the fun.
Sounds great.
But you... you are nothing. Less than nothing.
Turn back from the dark side. Help us save the lives of innocent people.
Give up your hatred.
Those not strong enough to survive by their own hands deserve death.
You don't have to continue down the dark path. You can still embrace peace.
The Force is life, not death.
Peace is a lie. There is only passion. And through passion, I gain strength.
I'll do my best to spare you the embarrassment.
That's a shame.
I'll just keep my head, then, since you won't be needing it.
That's good to hear.
Such witticisms will not save you.
Are you insane?
Pitiful scum like you cannot grasp the full nature of the Sith.
The power of the dark side is infinite... are you ready to face oblivion?
I had hoped you would turn back from this madness.
You leave me no choice.
I had hoped for a Jedi who could provide a true challenge!
There is no darkness that does not flee from the light.
I do not fear you.
There will be no fleeing from this fight!
I'm ready to take you out and get on with my mission.
Let's do this.
Then let's begin!
Are you ready to fight, or are you going to spout gibberish all day?
Can we get this over with?
Go ahead, keep blabbing.
I'm going to enjoy this.
The pleasure will be all mine!
I've heard enough.
You're right--words are nothing without action!
I am Sith!
Die!
We're shutting down that tractor beam. Don't get in our way.
Stand aside.
All you'll do here is die.
You think you're scary?
